## Description {#details}

An intrusive list with ownership and callbacks specified/controlled by <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ilist-traits">ilist&#95;traits</a>, only with API safe for polymorphic types.

The <code>Options</code> parameters are the same as those for <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simple-ilist">simple&#95;ilist</a></em>. See there for a description of what&#39;s available.

Definition at line 327 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/ilist-h">ilist.h</a>.
